taggableCodeList.noTrainingData:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating no training data is available
**UI Location**: Training Data Dashboard, in the list area
**When Users See This**: When there are no training data results to display
**Technical Context**: Displays an informational message and a graphic.
**Current English**: "No training data"
taggableCodeList.oopsSomethingWentWrong:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message indicating a failure to load content
**UI Location**: Training Data Dashboard, in place of the content list
**When Users See This**: When an error occurs while fetching training data
**Technical Context**: Part of a retry component; text should be concise.
**Current English**: "Oops! Something went wrong!"
taggableCodeList.retry:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to reattempt loading data
**UI Location**: Training Data Dashboard, below the error message
**When Users See This**: After an error message is displayed for data loading
**Technical Context**: Triggers the refetch function to try loading data again.
**Current English**: "Retry"
dashboardHeader.filterExerciseName:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for a text input filter
**UI Location**: Training Data Dashboard header, within the search/filter bar
**When Users See This**: When the user is looking for the input field to filter exercises
**Technical Context**: Placeholder for an input field that filters by exercise name.
**Current English**: "Filter exercise name"
